scripts.benchmark: hyperfine --prepare 'rm -rf .angular .nx/cache' --runs 5 'NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" pnpm nx run esbuild:build-webpack --skip-nx-cache' 'pnpm nx run esbuild:build-esbuild --skip-nx-cache' 'pnpm nx run esbuild:build-rspack --skip-nx-cache' 'pnpm nx run esbuild:build-rsbuild --skip-nx-cache'
scripts.benchmark:dev: hyperfine --prepare 'rm -rf .angular .nx/cache' --runs 5 'NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" pnpm nx run esbuild:browser-webpack --configuration=development --skip-nx-cache' 'pnpm nx run esbuild:browser-esbuild --configuration=development --skip-nx-cache' 'NODE_ENV=development pnpm nx run esbuild:browser-rspack --skip-nx-cache' 'NODE_ENV=development pnpm nx run esbuild:build-rsbuild --environment=browser --skip-nx-cache'
scripts.benchmark:prod: hyperfine --prepare 'rm -rf .angular .nx/cache' --runs 5 'NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" pnpm nx run esbuild:browser-webpack --skip-nx-cache' 'pnpm nx run esbuild:browser-esbuild --skip-nx-cache' 'NODE_ENV=production pnpm nx run esbuild:browser-rspack --skip-nx-cache' 'NODE_ENV=production pnpm nx run esbuild:build-rsbuild --environment=browser --skip-nx-cache'
